name: Customize Event Google Calendar for WooCommerce Booking
author: Ivan Barreda

sections.description:
This plugin is used to send custom information information about user and order when WooCommerce Bookings creates an event in Google Calendar.

Please note that this plugin is Add-on for WooCommerce Bookings, so it doesn’t do any thing without prior installation of WooCommerce Bookings.

This plugin is a fork from Google Calendar Event Add-on WooCommerce Bookings plugin
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 5.6 or greater is recommended
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater (MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended)
  • Installation of WooCommerce Bookings

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of “Customize Event Google Calendar for WooCommerce Booking”, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Customize Event Google Calendar for WooCommerce Booking” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our “Customize Event Google Calendar for WooCommerce Booking” plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Automatic updates should work like a charm; as always though, ensure you backup your site just in case.
sections.faq:
What hook is used?

The plugin used ‘woocommerce_bookings_gcalendar_sync’ filter hook.
